Class InventorySlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.entity.InventorySlot

  • public class InventorySlot
extends java.lang.Object
    A slot for an ItemStack.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • setEmpty

        public ItemStack setEmpty()
        Sets the current stack to nothing and returns the old stack if it exists.
        Returns:
        The old stack. This may not contain items.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this is empty, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if this is empty, false otherwise

      • setItemStack

        public ItemStack setItemStack(ItemStack newStack)
        Sets the ItemStack to the specified ItemStack and returns the old stack.
        Parameters:
        newStack - The stack to replace the old one
        Returns:
        The stack that was replaced. This may not contain items.

      • getItemStack

        public ItemStack getItemStack()
        Returns the pointer to the ItemStack object.
        Returns:
        The current ItemStack

      • takeItems

        public ItemStack takeItems(int count)
        Tries to take the requested amount of items from the stack and return it in a new stack. If too many items are requested then it will return as many as the stack currently has. The items are removed from this stack after they are taken.
        Parameters:
        count - The amount of items to take

      • combineItemStacks

        public boolean combineItemStacks(ItemStack toAdd)
        Try to combine this item stack with another. Returns true if it succeeded, false if not.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - The stack to combine with this stack
        Returns:
        True if it succeeded, false otherwise.

      • canCombineStacksWith

        public boolean canCombineStacksWith(ItemStack other)
        Returns true if the other stack is the same type as the current one and the items can be combined into one stack.
        Parameters:
        other - The stack to test combining with
        Returns:
        True if the stacks can be combined, false otherwise
